p.title: Mario
p.snippet: Mario (/ˈmɑːrioʊ, ˈmærioʊ/ ; Japanese: マリオ) is a character created by Japanese video game designer Shigeru Miyamoto. He is the star of the Mario franchise

p.title: The Super Mario Galaxy Movie
p.snippet: The Super Mario Galaxy Movie is an upcoming animated science fantasy adventure film based on the 2007 video game Super Mario Galaxy and Nintendo's broader
